conclusion: Determine the speed of the small steel balls using kinematic equations.
Identify given information: distance AB is 15 cm, distance BC is 20 cm, photograph has 1:1 scale, balls rolling on top of ball A.
Photograph shows several small steel balls rolling on top of ball A.
Distance AB is 15 cm, equal to 0.15 meters.
Distance BC is 20 cm, equal to 0.20 meters.
Distance AB is equal to distance BC due to 1:1 scale relationship.
Distance AB is equal to distance BC, which is 20 cm.
Use kinematic equation \( v^2 = u^2 + 2as \) to find speed.
Distance traveled by balls is equal to distance AB, which is 15 cm.
Speed of small steel balls is approximately 17.07 cm/s.
